mechanics.name: Sacrifice
mechanics.description: Unpreventable unit destruction does not trigger any any on death events

mechanics.name: Loss of Life
mechanics.description: Loss of life occurs when a unit loses health without taking damage

mechanics.name: Web Terrain
mechanics.description: Champions entering this space become Ensnared for 2 turns, unless they have <condition value=flying>Flying</condition> or are Race: Arthropod

mechanics.name: Dead Magic Zone
mechanics.description: Enemy spells cannot be targeted in this space.

mechanics.name: Deployment Zone
mechanics.description: An area around Shrine or a font where Champions and Relics can be brought into play

mechanics.name: Chasm
mechanics.description: When a non-Flying champion occupies this space, it is destroyed

mechanics.name: Knockback
mechanics.description: Pushes a target a number of spaces away. If the target hits an obstacle, both take 5 Physical damage for each remaining space. Non-flying units will use all their AP to prevent from being pushed off a chasm.

mechanics.name: Hallowed Ground
mechanics.description: At beginning of your turn, friendly Priests, Shamans, and Paladins are cleansed and healed for 5 HP, and terrain modifications are removed from this space

mechanics.name: Poison Cloud
mechanics.description: When a champion enters the poison cloud it becomes <condition value=poisoned>Poisoned</condition> for 2 turns. Champion in the cloud when its spawned (or champions spawned inside the cloud) take 6 damage. Any champions that move within the cloud take 3 damage. This damage ignores DEF.

mechanics.name: Dragonkin
mechanics.description: Any champion with Race: Dragon, Race: Draksar or Race: Skeezick

mechanics.name: Unstable Ground
mechanics.description: When a champion without <condition value=flying>Flying</condition> enters one of the affected spaces through normal movement, it takes 5 Physical damage

mechanics.name: Shifting Ground
mechanics.description: At the end of your turns, enemy champions on Shifting Ground lose all AP

mechanics.name: Ice Terrain
mechanics.description: Champions occupying this space gets -1 SPD, unless they have <ability value=600>Arctic</ability>

mechanics.name: Pacified
mechanics.description: This unit cannot attack or use abilities to attack, cannot engage other champions. This effect cannot be cleansed
